video.title: Vic the Viking
video.synopsis: Chief Halvar's clever young son, Vicky, lives on a Nordic fjord and learns the ways of a colorful band of Vikings who sail under his dad's command.

episodes.synopsis: Vic must reach the highest point on the drakkar to win a place on the next Viking expedition; Vic creates fireworks to scare off Sven and his crew.
episodes.title: The Highest Viking/Thor's Thunder

episodes.synopsis: Vic tries to scare off Eric the Greedy's tax collectors with an invention that creates "monsters"; Halvar, his men and the drakkar are seized by Sven.
episodes.title: The Magic Lantern/Grist for the Mill

episodes.synopsis: A fallen star draws Halvar and Sven's crews into a contest for a treasure with value only Vic understands; a shipwrecked sailor tricks the Vikings.
episodes.title: Shooting Star/Almost Treasure Island

episodes.synopsis: Messages in bottles from a damsel in distress lure the Vikings toward a pirate trap; fear of a Scottish sea monster throws Vic's crew off course.
episodes.title: Knock on Wood/The Monster

episodes.synopsis: Vic uses ingenuity to defeat a tyrannical queen and her army, who manufacture wind to wield their power; Faxe finds a wolf cub that needs its mother.
episodes.title: A Wind That'll Tear the Horns Off a Viking/Beware of the Wolf

episodes.synopsis: The Vikings are captured when Faxe eats an Icelandic clan's sausage stash; In Britain, Halvar and his men are seized by fierce Celtic women warriors.
episodes.title: Dagda's Cauldron/Trials of Halvar

episodes.synopsis: When a runic shape appears on the side of Halvar's face, Urobe convinces everyone that he has special powers; Vic discovers the "domino effect."
episodes.title: Shape Shifting/Judgement of Thor

episodes.synopsis: When Halvar thinks that he is jinxed, Vic must change his mind before they fight challengers; after Faxe rescues a whale, it follows him everywhere.
episodes.title: Good Luck Charm/Faxe and the Whale

episodes.synopsis: Tjure's baby will not stop crying, but when Baltac challenges Halvar, Vic thinks the screaming child may help; Sven and Halvar unite against a giant.
episodes.title: Son of Tjure/Shallow Waters

episodes.synopsis: Snorre's mother refuses to host the big harvest celebration until her son bathes; Snorre uses his talent when he, Tjure and Vic are kidnapped by Sven.
episodes.title: Snorre Soaps Up/Taken

episodes.synopsis: Sven is humiliated when Ylva, filling in for Halvar, gets the upper hand and seeks vengeance; a phony soothsayer and healer arrives in Flake.
episodes.title: Ylva in Charge/Stardust

episodes.synopsis: When Ylvi is captured to become a maid on Sven's ship, Vic and the Vikings rush to rescue her; Ulme's musical talents help the crew escape a maze.
episodes.title: Free Ylvi/The Tunnel

episodes.synopsis: When Gilby commandeers the drakkar, they go off course and Vic must find a whale to rescue them; in Spain, the Vikings chase and are chased by bulls.
episodes.title: Captain Gilby/Andalusia

episodes.synopsis: The king of Sweden wants Ylva to be his royal cook; the Vikings land in trouble when they take a shortcut through a canal without paying the toll.
episodes.title: The Invisible Treasure/The Canal

episodes.synopsis: The Vikings get help from a colony of stink bugs when Sven invades their village; Vic goes through a rite of passage to become a "True Viking."
episodes.title: Stink Bugs Attack/A True Viking

episodes.synopsis: Halvar's chiefdom depends on making a seagull land on his helmet, but the birds are drawn to Gorm; Vic makes the most of getting chicken pox.
episodes.title: Gorm's Seagull/Chicken Pox

episodes.synopsis: Halvar's crew must win a dance-off duel in Ireland to win their freedom; Vic tries to get the Vikings to plow their fields before going pillaging.
episodes.title: Victory Dance/The Forgotten Treasure

episodes.synopsis: When Tjure's hammer is thought to be Thor's, competitors try to free it from a stone; Halvar and his men find Sven's cavern, where words get frozen.
episodes.title: The Hammer in the Stone/The Cavern of Frozen Words

episodes.synopsis: To cure Faxe's ills, the Vikings seek a druid, but end up with an illusionist who uses them to escape; a haughty Viking provokes Halvar to compete.
episodes.title: The Druid Needs a Ride/Sparkling Race

episodes.synopsis: Vic uses Snorre's ventriloquism skills and disguises Tjure to fool the pirates and reclaim stolen treasure; Gilby needs Vic's aid to rescue castaways.
episodes.title: Siren Song/Castaways

episodes.synopsis: When Urobe is rewarded for bravery, Vic and Gilby go into the woods to prove their mettle; Halvar atempts to pillage a castle on a soporific island.
episodes.title: Dance with the Wolf/Silent Night

episodes.synopsis: Ulme‘s singing draws a bear to the village, causing havoc. / Baltak accuses Halvar of stealing and Vic sets out to prove his father's innocence.
episodes.title: Bear Up/The Thief Among Us

episodes.synopsis: Sven kidnaps Ulme, but soon regrets it, making him an easy mark for Vic; Snorre finds solace in a tribe of lisping natives who crown him king.
episodes.title: He's My Son/Trojan Snorre

episodes.synopsis: The Vikings enjoy a hot spring "spa resort," until they realize they have been conned; Halvar takes the children of Flake on a colorful field trip.
episodes.title: Resort Island/The War of the Berries

episodes.synopsis: During winter festival, Vic prevents a nocturnal impostor from stealing the children's presents; Vic conjures a genie from a lamp to help a prince.
episodes.title: Julbock/Arabian Nights

episodes.synopsis: The women of Flake, enraged at a lazy Tjure, ignite a feud between the men and women; a Chinese general tries to get the secret of the flying drakkar.
episodes.title: Trouble in Flake/Stranger in a Strange Land (part 1)

episodes.synopsis: Traveling from the Great Wall of China to the ocean, the Vikings teach a general and a group of villagers some new ways and defeat a mythical dragon.
episodes.title: Stranger in a Strange Land (part 2)/Bamboo Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Vic is forced to take a drakkar driving test, but Halvar interferes, getting them stuck in an ice maze; the Vikings enact a play based on Norse myths.
episodes.title: Licence to Sail/Loki the Trickster God

episodes.synopsis: Halvar's warrior brother turns out to be a gentle baker, who helps save Flake from attack; Vic helps shield an adventurous princess from a sandstorm.
episodes.title: Use Your Loaf/Princess Badoura

episodes.synopsis: Halvar and Sven bump heads fighting and swap personalities; fishing for clams and seeking a pearl for Ylva, the Vikings face an underwater monster.
episodes.title: Topsy Turvy/The Kraken

episodes.synopsis: When Ork and his Berserkers rob Flake and Shlake, Vic tries to unite Viking chiefs Halvar and Baltak; the Vikings compete in the Olympics.
episodes.title: Stronger Together/The Olympics

episodes.synopsis: Preparing Vic's birthday gift, Ylvi and Ylva end up stranded on a cliff; Halvar loses the anniversary ring he plans to give Ylva -- in a cow's belly!
episodes.title: Oops a Daisy/Cow Express

episodes.synopsis: When Gilby takes over Ylvi's tree house, he ends up dangling from a broken ladder; the Vikings must stop the drakkar as it drifts toward a waterfall.
episodes.title: The Treehouse/Up the River

episodes.synopsis: The Vikings and an evil warlord vie to possess an invincible sword; when Halvar attacks Sven with his new invincible sword, he puts himself in danger.
episodes.title: The Invincible Sword/Back To Flake

episodes.synopsis: Vic, Gilby and Ylvi cross a river they know is off limits and find themselves up a tree; Sven fools Gilby into believing he can become a pirate.
episodes.title: Mushroom Picking/Gilby the Pirate

episodes.synopsis: Vic must defend Halvar when he is accused of stealing the king of Sweden's scepter; when Vic lets Faxe steer, he invites a whale of a problem.
episodes.title: Mistaken Eye-Dentity/Moby Vic

episodes.synopsis: When Sven's ship sinks, the Vikings follow rules and rescue the pirates, but the pirates do not play fair; Ylva and Morag vie to win a baking prize.
episodes.title: It's Not What You Sink/For the Love of Cake

episodes.synopsis: The Vikings help Puck, who they think is a leprechaun, look for his friend, not realizing his friend is a bear; the Vikings are faced with eviction.
episodes.title: Being a Leprechaun/Summer Residence

episodes.synopsis: A man frozen in an iceberg thaws out and recruits the Vikings for his mission; the Vikings get stuck on an arctic ice sheet with a polar bear.
episodes.title: Grandpa Olaf/Who Let the Bear In
